targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")  
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ups_status")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  //|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "input_frequency")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "output_voltage")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "input_voltage")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "output_current" or r["_field"] == "output_voltage" or r["_field"] == "ups_power_nominal")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "output_current" or r["_field"] == "output_voltage" or r["_field"] == "ups_power_nominal")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "internal_temp")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery_voltage")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery_charge_percent")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  //|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "real_power" or r["_field"] == "nominal_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ups_power" or r["_field"] == "ups_power_nominal")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load_percent")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load_percent" or r["_field"] == "nominal_power")  
  |> drop(columns: ["host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._field == "nominal_power" then r._value / 100 else r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "output_current" or r["_field"] == "output_voltage")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "output_current" or r["_field"] == "output_voltage")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ups_power" or r["_field"] == "real_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ups_power" or r["_field"] == "real_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ups_status")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery_charge_percent" or r["_field"] == "battery_voltage")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  //|> range(start: -1d)  // Last day
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "real_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","serial","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> group(columns: ["real_power", "_measurement"], mode:"by")  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))  //needed if unit in kwh
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  //|> range(start: -1d)  // Last day
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "real_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","serial","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> group(columns: ["real_power", "_measurement"], mode:"by")  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, offset: -3h, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))  //needed if unit in kwh
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  //|> range(start: -1d)  // Last day
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "real_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","serial","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> group(columns: ["real_power", "_measurement"], mode:"by")  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))  //needed if unit in kwh
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  //|> range(start: -1d)  // Last day
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "real_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","serial","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> group(columns: ["real_power", "_measurement"], mode:"by")  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, offset: -3h, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))  //needed if unit in kwh
  |> yield(name: "mean")
